exceptions.exn: In environment b_nat : nat Hb_nat : (2 <= b_nat)%nat b := Z.of_nat b_nat : Z Hb : 2 <= b l, m, v : nat Hv : Z.of_nat v = α (2 + m) - α m Z2Zp_morph := Z2Zp_morphishm Hv' : ring_morphism 0 1 Z.add Z.mul Z.opp (Zp_zero Hv') (Zp_one Hv') (Zp_plus Hv') (Zp_mult Hv') (Zp_opp Hv') f Am_iAm_mod : 〘 A m 〙 = ⊟ 〘 iA m 〙 expoZ_opp1 : forall i : nat, expoZ i (-1) = 1 \\/ expoZ i (-1) = -1 j : nat Hl : l <> 0%nat Hj : (j <= m)%nat Hj' : (j <= 2 * l * m)%nat Unable to unify "nat2Zp ?M1484 (?M1485 * ?M1486) = Zp_mult ?M1484 (nat2Zp ?M1484 ?M1485) (nat2Zp ?M1484 ?M1486)" with "nat2Zp Hv' (alpha_nat ((l + (l + 0)) * m + j)) = nat2Zp Hv' (alpha_nat j) \\/ nat2Zp Hv' (alpha_nat ((l + (l + 0)) * m + j)) = exist (fun x : nat => (x < v)%nat) (rem (v - rem (alpha_nat j) v) v) (div_rem_spec2 (v - rem (alpha_nat j) v) Hv')".

In environment H : forall (p : nat) (Hp : p = 0%nat -> False) (u v : nat), nat2Zp Hp (u * v) = exist (fun x : nat => (x < p)%nat) (rem (rem u p * rem v p) p) (div_rem_spec2 (rem u p * rem v p) Hp) b_nat : nat Hb_nat : (2 <= b_nat)%nat b := Z.of_nat b_nat : Z Hb : 2 <= Z.of_nat b_nat l, m, v : nat Hv : Z.of_nat v = α (S (S m)) - α m expoZ_opp1 : forall i : nat, expoZ i (-1) = 1 \\/ expoZ i (-1) = -1 j : nat Hl : l = 0%nat -> False Hj : (j <= m)%nat Hj' : (j <= (l + (l + 0)) * m)%nat H0 : 〚 - α m 〛 = Zp_opp Hv' 〚 α (S (S m)) 〛 H1 : 〚 α (S m) 〛 = Zp_opp Hv' 〚 - α (S m) 〛 H2 : 〚 - α (S m) 〛 = Zp_opp Hv' 〚 α (S m) 〛 H3 : 〚 α (S (S m)) 〛 = Zp_opp Hv' 〚 - α m 〛 Unable to unify "nat2Zp ?M2859 (?M2860 - ?M2861) = Zp_plus ?M2859 (nat2Zp ?M2859 ?M2860) (Zp_opp ?M2859 (nat2Zp ?M2859 ?M2861))" with "nat2Zp Hv' (alpha_nat ((l + (l + 0)) * m + j)) = nat2Zp Hv' (alpha_nat j) \\/ nat2Zp Hv' (alpha_nat ((l + (l + 0)) * m + j)) = exist (fun x : nat => (x < v)%nat) (rem (v - rem (alpha_nat j) v) v) (div_rem_spec2 (v - rem (alpha_nat j) v) Hv')".

In environment H5 : forall (p : nat) (Hp : p = 0%nat -> False) (u v : nat), nat2Zp Hp (u * v) = exist (fun x : nat => (x < p)%nat) (rem (rem u p * rem v p) p) (div_rem_spec2 (rem u p * rem v p) Hp) H4 : forall (p : nat) (Hp : p = 0%nat -> False) (u v : nat), (v <= u)%nat -> nat2Zp Hp (u - v) = exist (fun x : nat => (x < p)%nat) (rem (rem u p + rem (p - rem v p) p) p) (div_rem_spec2 (rem u p + rem (p - rem v p) p) Hp) b_nat : nat Hb_nat : (2 <= b_nat)%nat b := Z.of_nat b_nat : Z Hb : 2 <= Z.of_nat b_nat l, m, v : nat Hv : Z.of_nat v = α (S (S m)) - α m expoZ_opp1 : forall i : nat, expoZ i (-1) = 1 \\/ expoZ i (-1) = -1 j : nat Hl : l = 0%nat -> False Hj : (j <= m)%nat Hj' : (j <= (l + (l + 0)) * m)%nat H0 : 〚 - α m 〛 = Zp_opp Hv' 〚 α (S (S m)) 〛 H1 : 〚 α (S m) 〛 = Zp_opp Hv' 〚 - α (S m) 〛 H2 : 〚 - α (S m) 〛 = Zp_opp Hv' 〚 α (S m) 〛 H3 : 〚 α (S (S m)) 〛 = Zp_opp Hv' 〚 - α m 〛 Unable to unify "(j <= m)%nat" with "nat2Zp Hv' (alpha_nat ((l + (l + 0)) * m + j)) = nat2Zp Hv' (alpha_nat j) \\/ nat2Zp Hv' (alpha_nat ((l + (l + 0)) * m + j)) = exist (fun x : nat => (x < v)%nat) (rem (v - rem (alpha_nat j) v) v) (div_rem_spec2 (v - rem (alpha_nat j) v) Hv')".

original: simpl. apply nat2Zp_mult. apply nat2Zp_minus. apply Hj.
